amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce discretionary funding in the bill by 5.5% across-the-board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to reduce discretionary funding in the bill by 5.5% across-the-board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jordan amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 284 (Roll no. 808).
